import React, {useState} from 'react' function ClientsForm() { const [client, setClient] = useState({ name: '', email: '', location: '', phone_number: '', developer : '', }) function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); fetch("http://localhost:9292/reviews", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ comment: comment, score: score, user_id: userId, game_id: gameId, }), }) .then((r) => r.json()) .then((newReview) => onAddReview(newReview)); } return (
